question: A term “stocks” was in news with reference to the climate change negotiations. What does “stocks “mean in this regard?
option1: Cumulative Forest and Biodiversity resources of a country
option2: Cumulative Forest and Biodiversity resources of entire earth
option3: Emissions accumulated in the atmosphere so far
option4: Semi-discrete subpopulations of a particular species in an ecosystem
answer: Emissions accumulated in the atmosphere so far
explanation: Stocks refer to the emissions accumulated in the atmosphere so far.
